tests.name: nested
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (text STRING) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT CONCAT(EXTRACTJSONFIELD(text,'$.name'),CONCAT('-',EXTRACTJSONFIELD(text,'$.value'))) from INPUT;

tests.name: null args
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (ID BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT test_udf(ID, NULL), test_udf(ID, ID, NULL) from INPUT;

tests.name: var args
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col0 BIGINT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='DELIMITED');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT test_udf(col0, col0, col0, col0, col0) from INPUT;

tests.name: struct args
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (col0 STRUCT<A STRING>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
